name: Big Boy Beach Ball
description:
A game about Big Boys playing Beach ball.

Contains a tournament mode, local pvp and coop and an underdeveloped overworld with two minigames and basic character customization.

This is a project that I intended to be bigger but will almost definitely never finish. It was "finished"  a good 6 months ago, it took until recently for me to decide to release it in its current state. The source code is included (it's disgusting).

I hope that you will enjoy it.
